summary.span: Selects a member from a list of candidates, and performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作類別這類的方法使用，其中系統會從一組可能的成員來執行時，會根據一組參數型別和引數的值;，其中系統會根據參數型別; 等等的方法。Implementations of the class are used by methods such as , which selects from a set of possible members to execute, based on a set of parameter types and argument values; , which selects a method based on parameter types; and so on. 預設實作類別由提供屬性。A default implementation of the class is provided by the property. ## Examples 下列範例會實作，並示範的所有成員`Binder`類別。The following example implements and demonstrates all members of the `Binder` class. 私用方法`CanConvertFrom`尋找相容的類型指定型別。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

span.para: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員： ， ， ， ， ，和。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`bindingAttr`不包含，所提供的預設繫結器實作只會傳回第一個項目`match`。If `bindingAttr` does not include , the default binder implementation provided by simply returns the first element of `match`. 沒有選取項目是完成。No selection is done. 這個方法所提供的繫結的控制項。This method controls the binding provided by .

summary.span: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.

span.span: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.
The matching method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會考量這兩個參數具有值的預設繫結器和`params`陣列 (`ParamArray` Visual Basic 中的陣列)。The default binder takes into account both parameters that have values and `params` arrays (`ParamArray` arrays in Visual Basic). 因此，很可能在案例中尋找相符項目位置`args`和`match`不包含相同數目的項目。Thus, it is possible to find a match in cases where `args` and `match` do not contain the same number of elements. 繫結器可讓用戶端對應回其原始形式的引數陣列，如果引數陣列具有操作的。The binder enables a client to map the array of arguments back to its original form if the argument array has been manipulated by . 使用此重新對應功能，所參考的引數這類引數都出現時取得。Use this remap capability to get back by-reference arguments when such arguments are present. 當您依名稱傳遞引數時，繫結器重新排列引數陣列。When you pass arguments by name, the binder reorders the argument array. `state`會追蹤參數的引數重新調整順序，因此可以讓繫結器的方法來重新排列成其原始形式的引數陣列。The `state` parameter keeps track of argument reordering, thus enabling the binder's method to reorder the argument array to its original form. 方法由方法。The method is used by the method.

exception.span: For the default binder, contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for .

span.span: For the default binder, contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for .

span.span: For example, contains a MyClass object that implements the IMyClass interface, and contains a method that takes MyClass and a method that takes IMyClass.

exception.span: For the default binder, contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in .

span.span: For the default binder, contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in .

exception.span: For the default binder, is or an empty array.

span.span: For the default binder, is or an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反映模型一般類型系統的存取範圍的規則。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 例如，如果呼叫端在相同的組件，呼叫端不需要特殊權限的內部成員。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否則，呼叫端需要。Otherwise, the caller needs . 這是一致的受保護的成員查閱、 private、 等等。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原則是`ChangeType`應該執行僅擴展強制型轉，永遠不會遺失資料。The general principle is that `ChangeType` should perform only widening coercions, which never lose data. 擴展強制型轉的範例強制為 64 位元帶正負號的整數值的 32 位元帶正負號的整數的值。An example of a widening coercion is coercing a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 這被區分縮小強制，可能會遺失資料。This is distinguished from a narrowing coercion, which may lose data. 縮小強制型轉的範例強制 64 位元帶正負號的整數，32 位元帶正負號的整數。An example of a narrowing coercion is coercing a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 下表列出由預設的強制型轉`ChangeType`。The following table lists the coercions performed by the default `ChangeType`. |來源類型Source type|目標類型Target type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何型別Any type|其基底類型。Its base type.| |任何型別Any type|它所實作的介面。The interface it implements.| |CharChar|UInt16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |ByteByte|Char、UInt16、Int16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleChar, UInt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |SByteSByte|Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt16, Int32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt16UInt16|UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int16Int16|Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt32UInt32|UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int32Int32|Int64、Single、DoubleInt64, Single, Double| |UInt64UInt64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |Int64Int64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |SingleSingle|DoubleDouble| |非參考Non-reference|所參考。By-reference.|
